title: Roundtable on Kerala’s future development to be held in Thiruvananthapuram
content:
A roundtable discussion is scheduled to take place.
*   The event will focus on Kerala's future development.
*   It is set to be held in Thiruvananthapuram.

title: Odisha looking to increase its contribution to national GDP from 3% to 5%: Governor
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Odisha is looking to increase its contribution to India's national GDP.
*   The state aims to raise its share from the current 3% to 5%.
*   This objective was announced by the Governor of Odisha.

title: Village headman among 27 persons booked after seven persons get injured at Mayana Kollai festival in Vellore
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Seven persons sustained injuries during the Mayana Kollai festival in Vellore.
*   Following the incident, 27 individuals have been booked by authorities.
*   Among those booked is the local village headman.

title: BSL-3 animal vaccine unit, GCC, Innovation Hub projects announced in Telangana
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   A new BSL-3 (Biosafety Level 3) animal vaccine unit has been announced.
*   A Global Capability Center (GCC) project has been announced.
*   Multiple Innovation Hub projects have been announced.

All these developments are slated for Telangana.

title: 31 govt. plots ‘illegally’ allocated at 5% of market value for Congress Bhavans in Karnataka: Chalavadi
content:
Chalavadi has alleged that 31 government plots in Karnataka were 'illegally' allocated.
*   These plots were designated for the construction of Congress Bhavans.
*   The allocation was reportedly made at a significantly undervalued price, just 5% of the plots' market value.

title: A.P. MLAs laud ‘people’s budget’, say it reflects government’s vision
content:
Andhra Pradesh Members of Legislative Assembly (MLAs) have highly praised the state's latest budget.
*   They specifically referred to it as a "people's budget."
*   The MLAs stated that this budget accurately reflects the government's vision and objectives.

title: AI can revolutionise healthcare, says Union Minister Anupriya Patel
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Union Minister Anupriya Patel believes Artificial Intelligence (AI) has the potential to revolutionize healthcare.
*   She stated that AI can bring about transformative changes in the healthcare sector.
*   The Minister's remarks highlight a high-level endorsement of AI's significant role in the future of medicine.

title: IT Minister apologises for AI summit troubles; Kharge slams ‘mismanagement’
content:
The IT Minister issued an apology regarding troubles that occurred at an AI summit.
*   Opposition leader Kharge criticized the handling of the event.
*   Kharge specifically labeled the issues as ‘mismanagement’.

title: India’s first private sector helicopter final assembly line inaugurated near Kolar in Karnataka
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   India has inaugurated its first private sector helicopter final assembly line.
*   The new facility is dedicated to the final assembly of helicopters.
*   It is located near Kolar in the state of Karnataka.

title: Budget will be planned to integrate climate action in schemes across departments: Stalin
content:
Chief Minister Stalin announced plans for the upcoming budget to integrate climate action.
*   This integration will extend to schemes across various government departments.
*   The initiative aims to embed environmental considerations directly into governmental planning and operations.
